description:
A traveler gets help from a mountain couple, a priest battles an evil entity, and an old man gets a double trouble.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soba and Mochi / Crab Questions and Answers / The Old Man and His Bumps
Soba to Mochi / Kani Mondou / Kobutori Jiisan
そばと餅 / 蟹問答 / こぶとり爺さん
